title: WATCH: Rachel Levine, Who Supports Trans-ing Kids, Is Happy They Transitioned As An Adult. Oh.
description:
As we all know, Rachel Levine is the very first beautiful and brave person to be a four-star officer in any of the United States uniformed services. Levine is also the Assistant Secretary for Health. And they really, really want to trans the kids.

This week, Levine promised that medically transitioning children will soon be normalized and said such, ahem, "medical care" has support at the highest levels of the Biden administration. Which may not mean much, since the absolute highest level is a very confused half-alive person who sniffs little children. But still. Not good.

None
— (@)

Levine spoke to gender-affirming doctors on a podcast hosted by Connecticut Children's Hospital, and said: "I can say that you, the children that you serve, the young people that you serve, their families, and you all have support at the highest levels of the federal government. President Biden supports you. I as the Assistant Secretary for Health will support you and I talk about this topic, everywhere I go, to get the word out."

Levine also said they hope child gender transition will soon be "fully embraced". But now, a 2019 clip of Levine has resurfaced where Levine says they are happy they transitioned after they had children: "I have no regrets because if I had transitioned when I was younger, then I wouldn't have my children. I can't imagine a life without my children."

None
— (@)

Levine transitioned at 54, after having two children and being married for 23 years. But now, Levine is working to permanently sterilize children, thus taking away any chance of them having children of their own. For "trans rights," of course.

I don't have to explain to you how absolutely sickening this is. And this issue certainly feels like it's approaching a boiling point. Good, honest people can typically take a lot of hits without striking back- even mandates of certain questionable medical injections. But you come for their kids? That's when things get ugly.

title: WATCH: Governor Whitmer Accuses Ron DeSantis Of Being A Kremlin Mouthpiece And We're Having 2016 Flashbacks
description:
Governor Whitmer recently made yet another media appearance, and this time, it wasn't to admit that banning gardening actually didn't stop COVID-19 (shocker, I know). No, this time she claimed that Ron DeSantis is a mouthpiece for the Kremlin.

I feel like I've seen this plot before...

None
— (@)

Whitmer made the comments in an interview with Jen Psaki, which will air this Sunday at noon, on Psaki's brand new MSNBC show, "Inside with Jen Psaki". In the clip from the interview, Psaki asked, "A fellow Governor, Ron DeSantis, recently made clear this week that supporting Ukraine is not a vital national interest to the United States. What do you say to that?" Whitmer said it is "dangerous when politicians are using language that is coming out of the Kremlin."

Silly DeSantis. Doesn't he know that Ukraine has a sovereign right to defend their borders against any and all invasions? Perhaps with a big, beautiful wall?

Really though, this is getting out of hand. The Atlantic just published an article titled, "DeSantis Will Betray Ukraine For MAGA Votes".

None
— (@)

I had no idea Ron DeSantis, the governor of Florida, was so vital to the Ukrainian people. One could say it actually feels like politicians are betraying America by caring more about Ukraine's border than literally anything else in the country. Including our very own border. But one may be labeled a Kremlin mouthpiece for such comments.

Anywho, of all the ways Psaki could have kicked off her new show, an interview with Gretchen Whitmer seems like a bad choice. She hasn't been relevant since the FBI tried to kidnap her. Given the shots she fired at DeSantis, I can't help but wonder if she's considering a 2024 run. I'm not sure if she or Gavin Newsom would be worse as President. I pray we won't find out.

title: 'Not When They’re Fed Propaganda': Elon Musk Slams Politician Who Claimed Good Parents Trans Their Kids
description:
Earlier this week, Minnesota Lt. Governor Flanagan claimed that all good parents have their children's genitals cut off. Oh excuse me, "all good parents have their children's genders affirmed". My mistake.

Flanagan also claimed that these procedures are "life-saving" and urged parents to "listen and believe” children who come out as transgender. I don't think any of us here need someone else to tell us that's objectively untrue. But Elon Musk did it anyway. Because he's cool like that.

Musk replied to the video on Twitter, writing, "Not when they’re fed propaganda by adults. Moreover, every child goes through an identity crisis before their personality/identity crystallizes. Therefore, we shouldn’t allow severe, irreversible surgery or sterilizing drugs that they may regret until at least age 18.”

None
— (@)

Musk is entirely correct, of course. It's insane to think that children should be able to make any sort of life-altering decision. Have these people ever been around a child? They change their minds constantly. Like, by the time you get out the bread to make them a sandwich for lunch, they've already decided they want soup instead. So why in the world would any well-meaning adult subject them to brutal "medical procedures" that will leave them mutilated and sterilized?

And I'm going to take it a step further. To the -gasp- "extremist" arena, if you will. Ultimately, "gender reassignment surgeries" should not be available to anyone, regardless of their age. "Doctors" are mutilating human beings because they think they can recreate a man or a woman. They're trying to play God. What magically happens when a person turns 18? Do these surgeries become any less harmful and life-altering?

And the procedures are far from "life-saving medical care". According to The Heritage Foundation, "The most thorough follow-up of sex-reassigned people—extending over 30 years and conducted in Sweden, where the culture is strongly supportive of the transgendered—documents their lifelong mental unrest. Ten to 15 years after surgical reassignment, the suicide rate of those who had undergone sex-reassignment surgery rose to 20 times that of comparable peers."

So it's not life-saving, and not a medical procedure. It should be outlawed, at least until 18. And it's a good thing we have the one of the richest men in the world on our side in this fight.

title: Watch: Local morning show gets St. Patrick's Day off to a raunchy start over confusion on getting "double-fisted"
description:
I'm a professional and have NOT started drinking yet today. Though the Proper Twelve is calling me and this is a good post to call it a day on. Because a Philadelphia morning show was ALL about getting started early when one of the greatest double entendres of all time was utter as they tossed (off) to the traffic report.

It's the ABC-6 morning news. The one in red is Karen Rogers. The one in yellow -- who may or may not have been kink-shamed here -- is Jessica Boyington.

Happy St. Patrick’s Day everyone! 🍻 🍀 pic.twitter.com/P07aB020uz
— Nicky💤 (@NickyZzZz1) March 17, 2023

"And to another woman who likes to be double-fisted, in a different way, I think, Jess."

Aaaaaand Jessica knew she was going viral.

I really should watch Archer for all the times I use that .gif.

What happened is that Karen confused "double fistING" with GETTING "double-fistED." The -ing makes all the difference. Double fisting is when you have two drinks at the same time, one for each hand. That would mean Jessica likes the sauce and couldn't wait to get to Paddy's Pub. Though sadly, per the weather report, it is NOT sunny in Philadelphia today.

GETTING fistED is something else entirely. This is a family website and you no doubt know how to find the Urban Dictionary. Let's just say it involves all your fingers and the fun part of a lady. Getting DOUBLE fisted, one would assume would require a second hand and a second...um, entry point.

There is a chance Jessica double-fisted Karen during the commercial break, in that she used both her fists as she beat the crap out of her. Or they laughed it off since it's St. Patrick's Day and the studio was buying.

title: Watch: Dylan Mulvaney's pre-transition appearance on "The Price is Right" resurfaced on the internet, and wow
description:
We here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website owe trans-TikTok startlet Dylan Mulvaney somewhat of an apology. When Dylan visited with Joe Biden and crossed over into our world, I thought Dylan was a parody. If I thought of someone who hated women and acted out how they thought women acted based on their stereotype of women, I couldn't imagine that person acting any different than Dylan acts as Dylan chronicles each day of being a girl.

I was wrong. Because pre-transition videos have resurfaced on the internet when Dylan -- what luck to have a name that can be for a boy or a girl - appeared on The Price is Right. And Dylan has always been themselves.

NEW: Footage has surfaced of Dylan Mulvaney—pre-transition—on ‘The Price Is Right’ pic.twitter.com/svxv0HMQMo
— Daily Caller (@DailyCaller) March 16, 2023

I've always wanted to be on The Price is Right. I used to watch it with my grandmother back in the day when Bob Barker was running sh*t. I always thought it would be cool to spin the big wheel and win money. My favorite was the yodler who would fall off the cliff if you went over. I'm glad Dylan at least got the opportunity that I never had.

And I hope people at least slid into Dylan's DMs after their TV debut. Winning things is exciting, and Dylan's excitement over doing so is infectious.

“No one cared who I was before I put on a dress.” pic.twitter.com/VfbVDYAOwQ
— Catch Up (@CatchUpNetwork) March 17, 2023

So a mea culpa to Dylan. Dylan is NOT making fun of women when they upload to TikTok. She is simply living the best life they also did as a he.

title: Tucker Carlson shocks Full Send Podcast with professor investigating brain damage of UFO victims for the US Govt
description:
Tucker Carlson is spilling allll the beans, and we are so here for it. On the “Full Send” podcast, Tucker told a story of a Stanford professor who was allegedly asked by the Department of Defense to investigate cases of troops dying after UFO exposure. Oh.

According to Tucker, this happened 11 years ago, and the professor studied the brains of more than 100 troops who died after encountering UFOs. The professor claimed to have expertise in traumatic brain injury, which would explain why he received this task.

None
— (@)

According to Tucker's source, the DoD had over 100 court cases from families of US servicemen who died after approaching UFOs that landed on military bases. The DoD was refusing to give them death or medical benefits, so families turned to the courts.

Carlson explained, "[In] a number of cases, these things have landed on military bases. ... Servicemen have approached them and they get a traumatic brain injury, or they’re killed. I’m like, why isn’t this on the front page of the New York Times? I don’t know.”

Susan Gough, a Defense Department spokesperson, told Military Times, "That story is false.' The Pentagon declined to comment any further.

However, there does seem to be evidence to back up Carlson's claim. Dr. Garry Nolan of Stanford spoke to Vice's Motherboard back in 2021 about what he's seen in the brains of UFO victims: "If you've ever looked at an MRI of somebody with multiple sclerosis, there's something called white matter disease. It's scarring. It's a big white blob, or multiple white blobs, scattered throughout the MRI. It's essentially dead tissue where the immune system has attacked the brain. That's probably the closest thing that you could come to if you wanted to look at a snapshot from one of these individuals. You can pretty quickly see that there's something wrong."

Now, I gotta be real with y'all - I'm not a believer. I just don't think it's likely that there are humanoid reptilian creatures from another planet soaring around Earth and abducting people left and right. I think it's more likely that the "UFOs" are either a foreign threat or something the US government is testing and doesn't want us to know about. But I'm open to the possibilities.

title: Watch As This TikTok Gym Bro Eats Dog And Cat Food. For The Gainz.
description:
Gym bros, y'all need to calm down a little bit. I'm sure there's a way to get your daily protein needs without turning to dog food. Like, 100% sure. This dude definitely seems like he is trolling for views, but he also actually ate dog food. And cat food. For the gains, bro.

The whole debacle began when he saw that MyFitnessPal claims Pedigree dog food has 666 grams of protein per serving. Which is obviously an error (and a Satanic one at that). But he still went to the store, bought dog food, and filmed himself eating it.

@henry.fit

Replying to @kenton916 ❗️trying the dog food❗️#fyp #fitness #bodybuilding #physique #creatine #gym #dogfood #viral

He promptly spit it out and said it's "not worth it," explaining, "Tasted like little pieces of dirt and I definitely don’t think it was worth it. Even though it’s a lot of protein, I’d take steak or protein powder." Uh, yeah. Like every other gym bro out there.

But this didn't stop him from eating wet cat food. If you've ever had a cat and given them the gelatinous tuna mixture for dinner, you'll understand just how mortifying this is. I nearly gagged just watching him.

@henry.fit

Replying to @hoss7549 ❗️trying the cat food 🐱❗️#fyp #fitness #bodybuilding #physique #creatine #gym #catfood #viral


Not only is eating canine food nasty, but apparently, it could just be bad for you. Who woulda thought? Melissa Majumdar, a spokesperson for the Academy of Nutrition and Dietetics, told BuzzFeed that dog food does not fall under the same rules and regulations as human food. Since it's for dogs. It can include animal byproducts like udders and lungs that are not considered safe for people to eat. Veterinarian Tracy Navarra also said, "Dogs’ intestines are equipped to deal with pathogens, bacteria, dirt, virus, litter, parasites, etc., that the human gut is not accustomed to. We are not the same, so we should not eat the same."

So to all the Gym Bros out there, maybe just have a steak and a glass of milk. Maybe don't go for the wet cat food. Just a thought.

title: Watch: Girl lives in her parent's shed to avoid paying rent, but this is no ordinary shed
description:
The Zoomers are coming up with very creative ways to avoid paying rent. Such as camping out in their parent's sheds.

This chick on TikTok gave a tour of her shed home after a viewer commented she "lives in a f**king shed". To which she responded, "I do live in a shed. This is my shed." But this was no ordinary shed. I've never seen a shed this nice in my lifetime.

@aniahhhhwarne

Reply to @delaney002 i love my rent free shed


The shed is the size of a studio apartment and fully equipped with a walk-in closet, heater, and air conditioner. It also has a large bed, tapestry, television, desk, and a nice garden view. It doesn't have a bathroom or kitchen, however. She has to go into her parent's house for those, which seems quite inconvenient.

In a follow-up video, she responded to viewer's questions about the bug situation: "Honestly, I don't have an issue with spiders or mosquitos or flies. I have the door and the window open right now, and there is not a single fly in here. I do have to be concerned about leaving food out, though, because of ants." I need to know how what kind of bug spray she's using, cuz this seems a tad unbelievable. I don't know how the shed could possibly repel bugs even with the door wide open all the time.

In an earlier TikTok, she said she always thought she would get a job, move away, and go to an out-of-state school. But instead she went to college in her hometown, moved into her parents' backyard, and became a "stoner." The American dream.

Now, obviously, living in your parent's backyard as an adult isn't ideal, no matter how cool the shed is. But since making this video, it looks like this chick actually did move out to Salt Lake City, Utah. So maybe the shed life was just a transitory phase. And a pretty cool one at that.

title: Spring break bro viciously assaults Def Leppard's one-armed drummer and we're guessing the motive
description:
Rick Allen, drummer for Def Leppard, was viciously assaulted while he was smoking a cigarette outside of a Fort Lauderdale hotel. No word on if the assailant yelled "do you wanna get rocked" as he attacked. But that would have been funny.

The assailant, nineteen-year-old Max Edward Hartley, was hiding behind a pole. According to the police report, Hartley charged Allen "at a full run" and knocked the summer to the ground. A woman ran out to help and she got some of Max's smoke too. Hartley then ran to another hotel and vandalized cars.

Hartley was arrested and is out on bail. He's charged with two counts of battery, four counts of criminal mischief, and abusing an elderly or disabled adult. Allen lost his arm in a 1984 car accident, hence the disabled.

Please know we here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website hold Def Leppard in the highest regard and are all about the music.

When Love and Hate Collide https://t.co/pLLZCCY9YN
— Louder with Crowder Dot Com (@LWCnewswire) January 28, 2023

Though without knowing Max Edward Hartley's motive, we are left to only speculate. These are our three best GUESSES.

1. Max has reason to believe his mother may have had sexual relations with Allen. Max is nineteen. Twenty years ago, Def Leppard was on a world tour promoting their album X. Max was defending his mother's honor because Allen never called her again. Also, them boys at Outkick shared Max's mugshot. Do you think there is a resemblance?

2. Alcohol. It was spring break and the kids are all into these things called "blackout rage gallons." AKA, BORG.

BORG pic.twitter.com/IFSNCNxzMn
— Old Row (@OldRowOfficial) March 13, 2023

Max had been sipping on his Louder with BORGer in the hot sun all day. His boys saw a one-armed man standing outside a hotel and dared Max to go do something.

3. This one also implies alcohol, but Max wasn't in his right mind and accidentally confused Allen for Vince Neil, lead singer of Motley Crue who Def Leppard is on tour with. Like most Crue fans, Max can't stand to see the band as they are and thought he was doing rock n' roll a favor by taking out Neil. Only, he took out Allen in his confusion.

Those are our guesses. Feel free to speculate on your own in the Facebook comment section.

What's most important is that Allen is okay and Def Leppard will continue rocking across America. Losing an arm didn't stop the music. Some schmuck from Ohio won't either.

title: Kamala Harris gets booed of out an Iowa arena when they showed her attempting to pander for March Madness
description:
March Madness? More like March SADness for Kamala Harris. Amirite?

I don't follow college basketball. When March comes around, I'm more of a "Road to WrestleMania" guy (LET'S GO CODY). What I can gather from Twitter is that those of you who follow the sport closely already have your brackets busted. But not as busted as Kamala Harris getting BOOED when they showed her face on screen at Wells Fargo Arena in Des Moines, Iowa.

As reported by the Associated Press, the veep was shown on the jumbotron during the men’s basketball game, and the boos were much louder than the applause. She was there to cheer her alma mater Howard University to victory.

They lost by thirty points.

Kamala Harris was booed by the crowd at a surprise March Madness appearance in Iowa as she watched her alma mater Howard University fall to Kansas, according to the AP. 😂 pic.twitter.com/gnZakJOhXa
— Julia 🇺🇸 (@Jules31415) March 17, 2023


Apparently, Vice President Kamala Harris is here in Wells Fargo Arena to support her alma mater, Howard.

They just put her up on the big screen and the a good portion of the arena started to boo lmao Iowa at its finest
— Eliot Clough (@EliotClough) March 16, 2023

I've yet to see video of the booing. If even the journalismers at the Associated Press couldn't find a reason to sugarcoat it, the crowd definitely wasn't saying BOO-URNS. Though the AP journalismers could have also decided they are all in for Pete Buttigieg.

While there isn't video of Kamala getting booed, there is video of Kamala tossing the word salad to her alma mater after their thirty-point loss. To quote our friends at Not the Bee, try and get through this two-minute video without doing the Joker's magic pencil trick on yourself.

Vice President Kamala Harris Delivers The Postgame Speech To Howard Men’s Basketball Team pic.twitter.com/yCNXolQPmA
— LIGHT ON COLLEGE SPORTS (@LightOnSports) March 16, 2023

It's funny to see this happen in Iowa, a state politicians only go to when they want people to think they are running for president. Kamala, when she isn't getting booed for existing, earns cheers from audiences when it's suggested Joe Biden replace her on the ticket. Even Democrats hate her and think she sucks at life is what I'm saying.

As of this writing, MSNBC has not created "March Madness and the entire state of Iowa are racist sexists" content yet. But you know it's coming, even if they go with "sexist racists" instead.

title: LOL: Enjoy watching the world's worst shoplifter get busted when the getaway driver refuses to unlock the door
description:
Let this video stand as a warning sign to any aspiring petty criminals out there. You may have heard that in cities run by liberals shoplifting is legal-ish. You still want to check local ordinances to see how much merchandise you are allowed to walk out with. You still want to have an escape plan. You also want to have a getaway driver who isn't a total nincompoop. This broad found out all of those things the hard way when her accomplice couldn't figure out to unlock the back door. Or, refused to. I'd hate to spread misinformation implying that the driver was an idiot when he may just have been a loser.

Oops 😬 🤣 pic.twitter.com/ac5kO5vn3P
— Clown World ™ 🤡 (@ClownWorld_) March 17, 2023

Apropos of nothing, can anyone tell me when or how a chipmunk version of "Walking in the Sand" became the go to TikTok soundtrack for epic fails?

As noted, shoplifting is more or less legal in some liberal cities. We've seen videos of people casually strolling out of stores with armfuls of clothes. Or in the case of one brazen gentleman, riding his bike. I can assume this is one of those cities. This woman looks like she walked out with an entire rack's worth of slacks. Maybe she should have brought a calculator with her to make sure she didn't go above the legal limit. If $950 is the cutoff between police being told to look the other way and a misdemeanor, jeans can easily run more than $100 a pair. That looked like more than ten pairs that were dropped when the lady realized she no longer had a ride home. I guess math isn't her strong suit.

But the best part of the video? It's not seeing the cop suddenly run into the shot. It's not even seeing the woman get put in handcuffs. It's hearing the dude recording the video laughing in the background, and the dude's daughter telling him to stop. That alone makes this a 10/10 video.

title: Watch: Sebastian Maniscalco uses St. Patrick's Day "outrage" to destroy cancel culture in under ninety seconds
description:
There are so few truly courageous comedians in this world. Dave Chappelle has some game. Bill Burr occasionally chirps up. Kevin Hart may take a risk or two. But Sebastian Maniscalco really put it all on the line on. All the specials on Netflix and Comedy Central and the millions and millions of dollars, Maniscalco risked it all. He risked it all by making a statement that so few have the testicoli to make.

The comedian took to Instagram to say the following: "Happy St. Patrick's Day." The video is from 2021, but it's still hilarious.

View this post on Instagram
A post shared by Sebastian Maniscalco (@sebastiancomedy)

"Is that okay? Or is Patrick, did he do something? Did we dig up something on him? What he do? Are we okay with the color green? Is that all right? Does someone get hopped up if someone takes out a green crayon? Four-leaf clover: are we all right with that? Leprechauns: how about that? The leprechauns gotta go, right? [...] Pot of gold? He shouldn't have a pot of gold because what? He's fortunate that he worked hard and made his money, so he's gotta give his gold to everybody else? You tell me what I can and cannot say. Aren't you embarrassed?"

Of course, he was doing a bit. No one, at least this year, is trying to cancel St. Patrick's Day. I'd like to think it's because we Irish are the last group to maintain their sense of humor during these overly politically correct times. Us, the I-talians, and rednecks. I'm just saying, I am, in fact, drunk as I write this.

But St. Patrick's Day hasn't been canceled, YET. All it would take is one person to be offended by one thing and tweet about it, and the holiday would uncritically go away. Singing "Fields of Athenry" would become hate speech. Celebrities would suddenly decide St. Patrick's Day was full of too much "whiteness." Politicians would look to score points off activists and have the name changed to Little People Appreciation Day. President Biden would sign whatever executive order about it after someone tells him to. That's the point Maniscalco is making. Sadly, no. No one is embarrassed about it.

To you, Sebastian, I accept your wishes of a happy St. Patrick's Day on behalf of my people. I'd also like to offer you an early happy St. Joseph's Day. The cakes are delicious.
